title: Make the wiki open for anyone to edit
body:
Currently it's **extremly** hard to reach someone to give you editing permission to the wiki. title: Download and cache all factsheet info upon load
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Instead of caching each individual search, we can download all of the factsheet info in one go (maybe in an AsyncTask on app load) and cache that instead. The only issue this would cause is we then need to find a way to parse the aliases ourselves, but that shouldn't be too hard. I guess it would all be loaded into a Map where different keys point to the same object.

The "About" section will contain disclaimers telling people to be careful with the information they read and to do more research before taking any substance. It also needs to have links to the combos and factsheets data to say where we get that from.

We can also add links to the website and information about donating.
